sentences.english: Hongfa promoted the liberal do personal assistant.
sentences.chinese: 鴻發提拔博雅做了私人助理。

sentences.english: She told us that she wanted to go to Pok Art Center to read books.
sentences.chinese: 她告訴我們，她最想去博雅藝術中心看書。

sentences.english: I learned last year in Weifang do liposuction plastic surgery hospital.
sentences.chinese: 我去年在濰坊博雅整形醫院做的吸脂減肥。

sentences.english: But this is just to get the property of the liberal zhujiajian planned step.
sentences.chinese: 但這只是博雅得到朱家財產的計劃中的一步。

sentences.english: Burson said it should not have agreed to keep its client's identity a secret.
sentences.chinese: 博雅說不該同意爲客戶的身份保密。

sentences.english: Mancini defended his selection of Boyata.
sentences.chinese: 曼奇尼爲他選擇博雅塔的決定辯護。

sentences.english: We took our daughter to Zhongshan Pok Art Center this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午，我們帶女兒去中山博雅藝術中心去了。

sentences.english: She said that she wanted to go to Pok Art Center to read some books.
sentences.chinese: 她說她想去博雅藝術中心看書。

sentences.english: Agencies recognized as "particularly strong" in a company statement were Hill & Knowlton, Burson-Marsteller, and Ogilvy PR Worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 公認特別牛逼的是偉達，博雅，奧美公關全球。

definition: to study the underlying principle to acquire knowledge (abbr. for 格物致知[ge2 wu4 zhi4 zhi1])/word for Western natural sciences during late Qing
correct (literary)/upright/(hon.) Please point out my shortcomings./I await your esteemed corrections.
academy of classical learning (Tang Dynasty - Qing Dynasty)
the train of thought in writing
to carry out (obligation) conscientiously/to behave sincerely

the Confucian Six Arts, namely: rites or etiquette 禮|礼[li3] (禮儀|礼仪[li3 yi2]), music 樂|乐[yue3] (音樂|音乐[yin1 yue4]), archery 射[she4] (射箭[she4 jian4]), charioteering 御[yu4] (駕車|驾车[jia4 che1]), calligraphy or literacy 書|书[shu1] (識字|识字[shi2 zi4]), mathematics or reckoning 數|数[shu4] (計算|计算[ji4 suan4])/another name for the Six Classics 六經|六经[Liu4 jing1]
